Player History
Drafted in 27th round, 424th overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2015...
Injured on 8/30/2015 with a Stiff Elbow, out for one week...
Traded from St. Louis (B) to San Francisco on 2/3/2021 (Going to SF: P Donald Cook, P Frank Babcock, P Thomas Carrillo. Going to SLB: P Christopher Smith)...
Earned first career win on 4/8/2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2021, winning 2 games with a 2.31 ERA...
Injured on 6/12/2021 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Injured on 6/22/2023 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/15/2024 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 4-5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/8/2025 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2025, off Bill Birdwell (BOS)...
Injured on 9/1/2026 with a Sore Elbow, out for one week...
1/31/2027: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,000,000 through salary arbitration...
Released by Seattle on 10/21/2027...
